#summary Setup instructions for Maven users.

== Setup ==

The Click Charts Maven bundle is available from the Maven 2 repository http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/net/sf/click/click-charts.

To include Click Charts in your project add the following dependency in your pom.xml:

{{{
<dependency>
    <groupId>net.sf.click</groupId>
    <artifactId>click-charts</artifactId>
    <version>X.X</version>
    <scope>compile</scope>
</dependency>
}}}

Specify the Click Charts version in the version tag e.g:
{{{<version>1.0</version>}}}
